channel.title: Need help on how to run a private server!
channel.description:
Ok first thing first... I downloaded the testscape and after i downloaded the testscape, i extracted all the files that is in it. Then after I've extracted all the files, i went to the forums and look for the right place where i can edit my compile.bat and runserver.bat. Then the next thing I've done was, I found the forum where i can edit the compile.bat an runserver.bat, then i copied the codes that is in to it. And heres the code that i got from the forums that i found
[code]@echo off COLOR 0c title counterscape Compiler
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now compiling server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
@echo off COLOR 0c title SERVERNAMEHERE Compiler
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now compiling server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now starting server... \ echo / \ echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pause [/code]
Then i tried to make a server on the server status of moparscape, but the problem is.... it says that The server "MYSERVERNAME" is offline, it must be online before you can register it here.
But before i try to make a server, i make a ip or what ever they call it like e.g no-ip.org/no-ip.info/no-ip.biz/no-ip.org. I made one of them then i try o make a server again but it still won't work......... So can some1 please help me how to run my private server cuz i know my ip address already but all i need is how to run my private server.
Thank you....... :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D

item.title: Need help on how to run a private server!
item.dc:creator: @good_boy98 good_boy98
item.description:
@good_boy98 wrote:

Ok first thing first…
I downloaded the testscape and after i downloaded the testscape, i extracted all the files that is in it.
Then after I’ve extracted all the files, i went to the forums and look for the right place where i can edit my compile.bat and runserver.bat.
Then the next thing I’ve done was, I found the forum where i can edit the compile.bat an runserver.bat, then i copied the codes that is in to it.
And heres the code that i got from the forums that i found

[code]@echo off
COLOR 0c
title counterscape Compiler

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@echo off
COLOR 0c
title SERVERNAMEHERE Compiler

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
pause
[/code]

Then i tried to make a server on the server status of moparscape, but the problem is…
it says that The server “MYSERVERNAME” is offline, it must be online before you can register it here.

But before i try to make a server, i make a ip or what ever they call it like e.g no-ip.org/no-ip.info/no-ip.biz/no-ip.org.
I made one of them then i try o make a server again but it still won’t work…
So can some1 please help me how to run my private server cuz i know my ip address already but all i need is how to run my private server.

Thank you…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to run a private server!
